statements: UPDATE sales_metrics SET sales_amount = 1500.75, salesperson_name = 'John Doe' WHERE sales_id = 100;
UPDATE sales_metrics SET salesperson_name = 'Jane Smith', sales_amount = 2000.50, sales_date = '2022-08-15' WHERE sales_id = 200;
UPDATE sales_metrics SET sales_amount = 1500.25 WHERE sales_id = 100 AND salesperson_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE sales_metrics SET salesperson_name = 'Alice Smith', sales_date = '2022-07-15' WHERE sales_amount > 2000 AND salesperson_name = 'Alice Johnson';
UPDATE sales_team_performance SET sales_volume = 50000 WHERE team_member_name = 'Alice';
UPDATE performance_metrics SET calls_made = 20, emails_sent = 15 WHERE team_member_id = 1 AND date = '2022-01-20';
UPDATE sales_team_performance SET sales_volume = 20000.50, sales_region = 'East' WHERE team_member_name = 'John Doe'
UPDATE performance_metrics SET calls_made = 100, emails_sent = 50, meetings_attended = 10 WHERE team_member_id = 101 AND date = '2022-10-15'
UPDATE sales_team SET sales_performance = 8.2 WHERE employee_id = 101
UPDATE sales_history SET sale_amount = 500.00, sale_date = '2021-10-15' WHERE employee_id = 102 AND sale_id = 201
UPDATE sales_team SET sales_performance = 85.5, sales_target = 15000.00 WHERE employee_id = 101
UPDATE sales_metrics SET actual_value = 12000.50, target_value = 15000.00 WHERE metric_id = 201
UPDATE SalesTeamPerformance SET sales_count = 1000, revenue = 50000.00 WHERE team_id = 1
UPDATE SalesMetrics SET actual = 45000.00, variance = 5000.00 WHERE metric_id = 1
UPDATE SalesTeamPerformance SET sales_count = 150, revenue = 25000.50 WHERE team_id = 101
UPDATE SalesMetrics SET actual = 7500.75, variance = 500.25, target = 8000.00 WHERE metric_id = 201
UPDATE sales_team SET team_leader = 'John Doe' WHERE team_id = 1;
UPDATE sales_metrics SET actual_value = 1200.50, target_value = 1500.75 WHERE metric_id = 3;
UPDATE sales_team SET total_sales_amount = total_sales_amount + 5000, average_sales_amount = 2500 WHERE team_id = 101
UPDATE sales_metrics SET actual_value = 7000.50, metric_name = 'Sales Revenue' WHERE metric_id = 201
